page.name: Dirge Thorn
page.description: There must have been one huge rose bush to produce this nasty blade.

page.description: The thorn to exterminate all your enemies

page.name: Moglin Frier
page.description: This sword has been the fiery demise of many a moglin.

page.name: Leather ring
page.description: Made of hand-stitched leather hide, this ring is very comfortable but not flashy.

page.name: One Ring
page.description: This ring feels warm to the touch. There is a partial elven inscription on the ring that reads: "If lost please return to Sau..." The rest is obscured.

properties.name: One Ring

page.name: O Ring
page.description: This ring is made of a flexible black material. You can replace it but it will cost you an arm and a leg.

page.name: Glass Ring
page.description: This ring is made of bright clear glass but it's stronger than it appears.

page.name: Artix Bobblehead Doll
page.description: This bobblehead was made in the image of the paladin Artix. It's ready to mount on the front of any wagon, just flick his head and watch it go!

page.name: Safiria Signed Portrait
page.description: This painted portrait of Safiria was signed by the vampire queen herself. It appears that she used some form of red ink.

properties.name: Safiria Signed Portrait

page.name: Bloodstained Mark of Honor
page.description: This certificate seems to have been awarded to an adventurer who never once used a healing potion. The name cannot be read due to the huge red stains, burn marks, and slashes in the parchment.

page.name: Battlerage
page.description: This type of oddly bladed sword is favored by several tribes of barbarians.

page.name: Rod of the Fiery Fist
page.description: This forceful staff was created for a fire mage to help focus his pyromancy.

page.name: Nature's Call
page.description: This is the type of staff carried by those who practice natural magic.

page.name: The Righteous Hand
page.description: This type of staff is used mostly by simple fighting monks, to help focus their fighting magics. A very defensive staff.

page.name: The Burning Gem
page.description: This staff is strangely warm to the touch. It's topped by a magical gem that is larger than your fist.

properties.name: The Burning Gem

page.name: Willshaper
page.description: This ordinary looking staff was created long ago and holds the secret to ancient magics. If only you could unlock those secrets...

properties.name: Willshaper
properties.description: This ordinary looking staff was created long ago and holds the secret to ancient magics. If only you could unlock those secrets...

page.name: Talon Magic
page.description: This staff has been marked by a powerful dragon, in an attempt to blend dragon magic with more common arcane spells.

properties.name: Talon Magic
properties.description: This staff has been marked by a powerful dragon, in an attempt to blend dragon magic with more common arcane spells.

page.name: Dracolux
page.description: This powerful offensive staff is the result of a successful blending of dragonfire with arcane light spells.

properties.name: Dracolux
properties.description: This powerful offensive staff is the result of a successful blending of dragonfire with arcane light spells.

page.name: The HeatBloom
page.description: A Fire Rose has been magically grown on the top of this staff. These roses only grow near a fire or an intense heat source.

page.name: Arachnomancer staff
page.description: A giant spider sits atop this staff. Long ago, it was used to control the giant spiders in the area, but it lost most of its power long ago.

properties.description: A giant spider sits atop this staff. Long ago, it was used to control the giant spiders in the area, but it lost most of its power long ago.

page.name: Otherworldly Staff
page.description: This strange weapon is made of a strange material found in the heart of a comet that fell to earth.

properties.name: Otherworldly Staff
properties.description: This strange weapon is made of a strange material found in the heart of a comet that fell to earth.

page.name: Staff of the Sun
page.description: This lovely staff is made of highly polished gold. It would have been melted down long ago but a powerful ancient magic protects the staff and those who wield it.

properties.name: Staff of the Sun
properties.description: This lovely staff is made of highly polished gold. It would have been melted down long ago but a powerful ancient magic protects the staff and those who wield it.

page.name: Steam-Powered Staff
page.description: This staff is a techno-mystical wonder! It is a perfect blending of technology and magic. You can feel the powerful vibrations of an engine coming from the metal orb on top.

properties.name: Steam-Powered Staff
properties.description: This staff is a techno-mystical wonder! It is a perfect blending of technology and magic. You can feel the powerful vibrations of an engine coming from the metal orb on top.

page.name: The Grasping Claw
page.description: This wooden staff is topped by a horrible shrunken monster's claw. It's been so deformed by age and magic that you can no longer tell what kind of monster it was.

page.name: Boneslice
page.description: This knife cuts clean to the bone!

page.name: Misericorde
page.description: Elegant and blackened, this blade will put your enemies out of their misery.

page.description: Once, in a village so small that it did not even have a name, there was a young Pyromancer... he might recognize this Knife.

page.name: Frozen Kris

page.name: Under Current

page.name: Dragonlord's Prize
page.description: This dagger is said to be a cherished prize of a powerful Dragonlord. It was taken from the hand of an assassin sent by a dragon to stop the Lord's rampage.

page.name: Lord Max's Hair Splitter
page.description: This dagger was forged in honor of Lord Max II, the second person to obtain the Twin Blades of Doom! This dagger has been sharpened with a secret method and will never lose its razor edge.
